definition: threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: That is the way all military units come to the firing range.
sentences.chinese: 这是所有战斗单位前往靶场的必经之路。

sentences.english: The video interpretation is an important component of modern optical measurement equipment.
sentences.chinese: 视频判读仪是现代靶场光测设备重要组成部分。

sentences.english: In this thesis, the location and recognition of targets is our main work.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究靶场监测中靶图像的识别定位问题。

sentences.english: Would anybody like to visit my pistol range downstairs ?
sentences.chinese: 谁愿意到楼下去参观参观我的手枪靶场？

sentences.english: Moreover, the calibration scheme is outlined on the basis of the characteristics of radiometry for shooting range.
sentences.chinese: 根据靶场辐射测量特点，设计了整体定标方案。

sentences.english: The work of the thesis is below:1. Discussed the infection of time and interspaced adjusting techniques to shooting range test data.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了时间和空间校准技术对靶场试验数据的影响。

definition: to fire a gun/to substitute for sb in sitting an examination
to test-fire/to conduct a missile test
to throw an explosive charge/to bomb
